author: smartprogrammer
content: Cant we give core devs mod role?

author: ajsutton
content: The painful thing is that no matter how fast we ban them, the bots can post to all channels so quickly and discord doesn't mark the channel unread again afterwards.  So to reduce the impact of spam we really need to make it harder to join the server or find keywords we can block to stop them.

author: ajsutton
content: There are some raid preventions that slow them down a bit but they seem to have found a way around it again.
